abstract: Access to Amazon Instant Videos can be gained in many ways, including via game consoles and devices that connect to your TV set.
snippet: Access to Amazon Instant Videos can be gained in many ways, including via game consoles and devices that connect to your TV set.
lead_paragraph: Q. Is there a way to watch Amazon’s Instant Video on my television instead of my tablet? If I’m subscribed to Amazon Prime in the United States, can I watch the Prime Instant Video outside the country, like when I’m traveling overseas for work?

headline.main: Amazon Prime Video, Home and Away
